content.raw:
> the door skin seems to have darkened.

Actually the sun is just hitting the habitat from a different angle. The sun orientation is randomized when the worlds are generated.

> You can see how the shadow appears to affect the door but not the stairs and such.

Yes, this is related to shadows. But I think actually none of the models (OBJ meshes) are receiving shadows. They look darker because the sun angle is different, but objects are not blocking the sun for others.

Not sure what's the best solution here, enabling shadows will decrease FPS even further. Plus, if I recall correctly, I think OBJ meshes can't receive shadows yet.
